item.title: Why Nvidia Just Invested $5 Billion in Its Competitor, Intel
item.description: Nvidia and Intel will team up to work on data centers that form the backbone of AI infrastructure as well as personal computer products.

item.title: Preparing for Tomorrow: Inc. 5000 CEOs on AI, Culture, and Adaptability
item.description: The conversation reveals how today’s top business leaders are laser-focused on workplace culture, adaptability, and the integration of generative AI.

item.title: What the Internet Got Wrong About That Viral Gap-Katseye Ad
item.description: We asked the marketing agency behind Gap’s ‘Better in Denim’ campaign—featuring Katseye—about that American Eagle ad.

item.title: 3 Branding Moves Every Service Business Needs to Scale Without Losing Its Soul
item.description: Growth can kill a brand faster than competition. Here’s how to do it the right way.

item.title: The Fed’s Own Economists Disagree Where the Economy Is Heading
item.description: The Fed cut rates, but there’s no consensus on what comes next for policy.
